nodes.text: Moryo Bean was a male Human who was worked for the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the cantina in the Toxic Lake Garrison.

Moryo Bean first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the cantina vendor for the Empire on Taris. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Vendors.
